    getPosition() - Method in exception class com.thaiopensource.datatype.xsd.regex.RegexSyntaxException

    R

    Regex - Interface in com.thaiopensource.datatype.xsd.regex

    RegexEngineImpl - Class in com.thaiopensource.datatype.xsd.regex.java

    RegexEngineImpl - Class in com.thaiopensource.datatype.xsd.regex.xerces2

    T

    translate(String) - Static method in class com.thaiopensource.datatype.xsd.regex.java.Translator
    Translates a regular expression in the syntax of XML Schemas Part 2 into a regular expression in the syntax of java.util.regex.Pattern.
    Translator - Class in com.thaiopensource.datatype.xsd.regex.java
    Translates XML Schema regexes into java.util.regex regexes.

    U

    UNKNOWN_POSITION - Static variable in exception class com.thaiopensource.datatype.xsd.regex.RegexSyntaxException
    Represents an unknown position within a string containing a regular expression.
